objects.name: Mercury
objects.description: The smallest and innermost planet in the Solar System
facts: Mercury has no moons
It has the most eccentric orbit of all planets
Despite being closest to the Sun, Venus is actually hotter

objects.name: Venus
objects.description: Second planet from the Sun and Earth's sister planet
facts: Venus rotates backwards compared to most planets
It has the hottest surface of any planet in our solar system
The atmospheric pressure is 90 times that of Earth

objects.name: Earth
objects.description: Our home planet and the only known planet with life
facts: Earth is the only planet not named after a god or goddess
It is the densest planet in the Solar System
71% of Earth's surface is covered in water

objects.name: Mars
objects.description: The Red Planet and potential future home for humanity
facts: Mars has the largest volcano in the solar system
It has two small moons: Phobos and Deimos
The soil contains the nutrients needed to grow plants

objects.name: Jupiter
objects.description: The largest planet in our Solar System
facts: Jupiter has at least 79 moons
The Great Red Spot is a giant storm that has lasted for centuries
It has the strongest magnetic field of any planet

objects.name: Saturn
facts: Saturn's rings are made mostly of ice and rock
It has 82 confirmed moons
It is the least dense planet in the Solar System

objects.name: Uranus
facts: Uranus rotates on its side
It was the first planet discovered using a telescope
It has 27 known moons

objects.name: Neptune
facts: Neptune has the strongest winds in the Solar System
It was discovered through mathematical predictions
It has 14 known moons
